display_long_description:
Light of the Nine is a VR escape-room experience centered entirely around light, color, and simple mechanisms.
You wake up inside a forgotten dark sanctuary. Each room reveals new puzzles and devices, teaching you the rules and giving you the tools to finally end the forever night.
You will not be handheld, everything is communicated through the environment. Stone architecture, symbols, colors, shifting mechanisms and light will guide you. Careful observation and experimentation are rewarded, encouraging a slow and thoughtful approach.
Each chamber introduces a new way to play with light. As you progress, the logic deepens, puzzles become more interconnected, and earlier details gain new meaning.
Light of the Nine offers a calm, atmospheric journey focused on pure reasoning. Every challenge can be solved through logic alone.
A compact VR adventure designed for players who enjoy unraveling a mystery piece by piece, guided only by light.
